section.p: The Problem List Section contains data on the problems currently being monitored for the patient.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Active Problems Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.6) (C83-[CT-103-2])

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (C83-[CT-103-1]), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.7)
SHALL conform to CCD Problem Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11)
SHALL conform to IHE Active Problems Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.6)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11450-4" Problem list (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-141, CONF-142)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF-140), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (C83-[CT-103-1]), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.7)
SHOULD contain a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'problems'. (CONF-144)
